# List All App Previews for an App Preview Set

**Web Service Endpoint**

List all ordered app previews in a preview set.

## Listing and Reordering All Previews in a Set

- **Get All App Preview IDs for an App Preview Set**: Get the ordered app preview IDs in a preview set.
- **Replace All App Previews for an App Preview Set**: Change the order of the app previews in a preview set.
